description:
Ferrosi is the perfect
softshell for lightweight, durable, stretchy, UPF 50+ weather resistance in an ideal spring and
summer weight for climbing, hiking, and multi-sport days. Plus, an eco-friendly fabric that's 46%
recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Joggers - Mens

specs.value: Bluesign® approved - 46% Recycled Nylon, 40% Nylon, 14% Spandex
